code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Calculator.css';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Calculator=()=>{const[input,setInput]=useState('');const[result,setResult]=useState('');const handleInput=value=>{setInput(input+value);};const calculateResult=async()=>{try{const response=await
